title: Part A
stimulusHtml: • ONE point for describing how one specific piece of evidence supports Carr’s interpretation
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

• ONE point for describing how one specific piece of evidence supports Carr’s interpretation

The student response earns one of the following points:

• ONE point for describing how one specific piece of evidence supports Carr’s interpretation

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: • ONE point for describing how one specific piece of evidence undermines Carr’s interpretation
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

• ONE point for describing how one specific piece of evidence undermines Carr’s interpretation

The student response earns one of the following points:

• ONE point for describing how one specific piece of evidence undermines Carr’s interpretation

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: • ONE point for explaining how one feature of the political context of the 1920s and 1930s (the interwar period) influenced Carr’s interpretation
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

• ONE point for explaining how one feature of the political context of the 1920s and 1930s (the interwar period) influenced Carr’s interpretation

The student response earns one of the following points:

• ONE point for explaining how one feature of the political context of the 1920s and 1930s (the interwar period) influenced Carr’s interpretation
